metadata.title: CVE-2024-27903 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: OpenVPN plug-ins on Windows with OpenVPN 2.6.9 and earlier could be loadedfrom any directory, which allows an attacker to load an arbitrary plug-inwhich can be used to interact with the privileged OpenVPN interactiveservice.

criterions.comment: openvpn package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
